ygData.subject: Re: Reed?
ygData.msgSnippet: Good thing I checked the message boards ;) I visit the mailing list, but not regularly (There s just too much stuff out there :()  FYI, the best thing to do
ygData.messageBody:
Good thing I checked the message boards ;) I visit the mailing list,
but not regularly (There's just too much stuff out there :() FYI,
the best thing to do with errors is to e-mail me (eqreed@...).

Anyhow, The problem with chant of battle with a drum, is that I have
no numbers before the 15th level. When I don't have data, I just put
in zero :(

Set your level to 15, and you'll start seeing some numbers. If you
have any drum numbers for less than level 15, I'd love to know :)

I'm also debating going to a pure "formula" version, but that's down
the line.

- Reed

--- In eqbards@y..., Talies the Wanderer <snicker@p...> wrote:
> Was just checking the calculator, and I noticed that according to
it, you
> always get 0 for using an instrument with Chant of Battle - but
Chant
> definitely has a bonus with an instrument.
>
> Just thought I'd mention it.
>
> Talies the Wanderer
